org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.hal

Class LPS22HD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rocketproplab.marginalstability.flightcomputer.hal.LPS22HD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Barometer, PollingSensor

    public class LPS22HD
extends java.lang.Object
implements Barometer, PollingSensor
    The LPS22HD HAL implementation. Refer to the datasheet for specification https://www.st.com/resource/en/datasheet/lps22hd.pdf
    Author:
    Clara Chun, Max Apodaca

    • Constructor Detail

      • LPS22HD

        public LPS22HD(com.pi4j.io.i2c.I2CDevice i2cDevice,
               Time time)
        Create a new LPS22HD with the given i2cDevice and time. Time will be used to determine the getLastMeasurementTime() return value.
        The i2cDevice parameter is not checked for a valid address.
        Parameters:
        i2cDevice - the device which should be used to communicate via i2c
        time - the time to use when reporting measurement time.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Set the initial registers to turn on the device and set polling rate to 25Hz with a lowpass cutoff of 1.25 Hz. Also turn on register synchronization to keep the high low and very low pressure registers updating in sync.

      • getPressure

        public double getPressure()
        Description copied from interface: Barometer
        Get the pressure in hPa
        Specified by:
        getPressure in interface Barometer
        Returns:
        get the pressure in hPa

      • inUsableRange

        public boolean inUsableRange()
        Description copied from interface: Barometer
        Returns if the pressure is in a usable range. If the sensor is in too low or too high air pressure the data we get might be garbage.
        Specified by:
        inUsableRange in interface Barometer
        Returns:
        if the current pressure is in a usable range

      • getLastMeasurementTime

        public double getLastMeasurementTime()
        Description copied from interface: Barometer
        Gets the time at which the last measurement was made
        Specified by:
        getLastMeasurementTime in interface Barometer
        Returns:
        the time of the last measurements

        Description copied from interface: PollingSensor

      • readPressure

        private void readPressure()
        Read the current pressure form the sensor using a one shot read method.
